= Frame=

First thing is to choose your frame setup. Do you want a quad-, an hexa- or an octocopter?

It would be necessary to think on your flight orientation preference, as it may have consequences on your building choice. For example, if you're planning to do some aerial photography, "X" mode would be a better choice than "+" mode. More informations [RC here].

You can find [http://code.google.com/p/arducopter/wiki/Quad_Frame_Assembly here] the !ArduCopter Quad's build, with a step-by-step instruction.
